Chinese.name: Kafka数据加载到CDW
Chinese.description: 本示例会根据Kafka分区Id去消费Kafka数据，然后将数据写入云数据仓库CDW。
Chinese.attention: 在使用本示例代码时需要传递相关函数的环境变量,本实例由两个函数组成。

English.name: KafkaLoadToCDWConsumer
English.description: This example consumes Kafka data based on the Ckafka partition Id, then write the data to CDW.
English.attention: When using this sample code, you need to pass the environment variables of related functions. This example consists of two functions.
